course.title: Bod, Bod chen po, and the historical geography of the Tibetan cultural area
course.faculty_text: Leonard W. J. van der Kuijp
course.description: This course will examine the geography of Bod and Bod chen po, the division of its territories, and a variety of key place-names from an historical perspective. This will be a seminar-cum-reading course using Tibetan (and some Chinese) sources from the ninth to the nineteenth century.
course.prerequisites: Reading knowledge of Tibetan and an insatiable intellectual curiosity.
